sentence: The fact that this years GOP Senate primary features Herschel Walker, arguably the greatest college football player of all time who won a national championship with the University of Georgia, probably helps stir public interest in the race, as well as President Trumps furious denunciations of incumbent GOP governor Brian Kemp, although Kemp is leading the polls by a wide margin.
author: Jim Geraghty
title: Much Higher Minority Early Voting in Georgias Upcoming Primaries

sentence: The higher-profile race was the battle for the gubernatorial nomination between Brian Kemp and David Perdue, which Kemp won in an extraordinary rout.
title: The Good News in Georgia Thats Bad News for Trump
